#summary DVD Profiler Provider Information

NOTE: as of 2.0 there is a single dvd profiler provider, and it is called "dvdprofiler".  The dvdprofiler_local has been renamed to simply "dvdprofiler"

= DVD Profiler Local Provider (dvdprofiler) =
 * Requires local Collection.xml and images
 * Supports ONLY single location
 * Indexes movie list using Lucene for fast lookups
